last_episode_to_air.name: Pyaar Ka Postmortem
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ruchi and Mitali finally get to meet Sneha and push her to confess her side of the relationship. It is then, when Sneha erupts into a rant as to how Nikhil and in fact, all boys mess up in relationships.

name: Girlsplaining
overview: How can two girls, a batchmate and a senior, teach and train a guy who is clueless about relationships and sex?
